message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 9-1-1, translated into en
data: The indicator reflects the results of passenger transportation and circulation business activities of various economic types in a certain period of time, which is the basis for assessing the situation of passenger transportation and circulation in the period, and at the same time, at the same time is one of the important sources of information for the management and planning of transportation and passenger rotation to meet the travel needs of the population.
